about_the_game:
Overwing

In surreal skies where boundaries blur, you are the White Eagle, guardian of the Sacred Core. By day, gather lost souls to unlock and amplify your abilities, pushing your powers to unimaginable extremes. Soar faster, strike harder, and wield the sky itself as your weapon.

By night, fend off the relentless Red Eagles that descend to shatter the light. With every battle, you grow, evolving into a force that defies reason.

Will your ascent protect the Core, or will the sacred light be swallowed by shadow?

Overwing is a surrealist action game where players control a White Eagle, tasked with collecting souls and defending a Sacred Core from enemy Red Eagles. The gameplay alternates between two phases:

  • Day Phase: Players explore surreal environments to collect souls, which are used to level up and enhance abilities. Skills can be upgraded to extreme levels, such as increased flight speed, powerful aerial attacks, or defensive maneuvers.

  • Night Phase: Players engage in combat, defending the Core against waves of Red Eagles. Strategic use of upgraded skills is key to survival.

The game features:

  • A unique leveling system tied to soul collection.

  • Dynamic enemy waves that increase in difficulty over time.

  • Stylized visuals inspired by surrealist art.

  • Fluid flight mechanics with precise controls for exploration and combat.

Overwing combines fast-paced action, skill progression, and a dreamlike aesthetic to deliver a captivating experience.

name: OverWing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1060 3 GB or AMD RADEON RX 580 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1060 3 GB or AMD RADEON RX 580 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
